text: Juan de Dios Pintado Leines (born 28 July 1997) is a Uruguayan footballer who plays as a midfielder for Goiás, on loan from Juventud de Las Piedras of the Uruguayan Primera División. ==Career== ===Juventud=== ====Goiás (loan)==== on 13 January 2020 Campeonato Brasileiro Série A club Goiás signed Pintado on loan from Juventud. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="6"|Juventud |2015–16 |rowspan="3"|Primera División |4||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||colspan="2"|–||4||0 |- |2016 |13||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||13||0 |- |2017 |18||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||18||0 |- |2018 |rowspan="1"|Segunda División |26||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||26||0 |- |2019 |rowspan="1"|Primera División |35||1||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||35||1 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !96!!1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!96!!1 |- |Goiás (loan) |2020 |Série A |7||0||4||0||2Appearance(s) in the Copa Sudamericana.||0||4Appearance(s) in the Campeonato Goiano.||0||17||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !103!!1!!4!!0!!2!!0!!4!!0!!113!!1 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Juventud de Las Piedras players Category:Goiás Esporte Clube players Category:Uruguayan Primera División players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:People from Las Piedras, Uruguay
title: Juan Pintado
